jd: Hello,Greetings for the day!!!Please review the below role and advise the best time to connect with you. If you are interested, You can reach me on linkedin.com/in/saumen-kumar-porel-97a0696b and send resumes to steve@3mkllc.comsend resumes to steve@3mkllc.comIndia or Mexico req - Hiring: PROGRAM Managers to lead multiple project managers and projects with 8+ Yrs Project/Portfolio management & 5+ Yrs Program Management experience Exp neededLocation: Remote Rate: Open / hr (In Indian or Mexican rates)Contract: Long Term JD:We need PROGRAM managers that are able to lead multiple project managers and projects. We do not need project managers. They should also be senior enough to know SAFE. Fluent in EnglishSenior with at least 5+ Program Management experience, and 8+ years of overall Project/Portfolio management experienceSAFE Certified ideallyAbility to lead other project managersAbility to run multiple projects within a programMover and shaker and driven
